name: Get in Line! (GMTKjam2020)
description:
WARNING: Development for this game was poorly planned and there's still quite a few bugs! Fixing some of those would necessitate a complete rewrite of the game. As it's a jam gam, I just wanted it to be done. Sorry for the inconvenience^^

You are in DMV hell. Your mission : renew your car permit. Is it form C6-d1 or C6-d2? Do you also need to fill out form A77-0? And where do you submit that? How much does it cost?! Oh no! It's already so late, there are so many people here now!

Controls :

  • WASD/arrow keys - move
  • X/Y/Z - interact
  • I/E - open inventory
  • M - mute

Originally made for GMTK jam 2020 in ~22h (but not within the deadline!). The theme was "Out of control". The idea was that waiting in line and filling forms are actions that remove your control of the actual action. I thought waiting in line was a funny idea to make into a game :D
